alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun; Clark; Cleveland; Dallas; Drew; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 7:55AM CDT until June 10 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Cleveland County in southeastern Arkansas... Bradley County in southeastern Arkansas... Southeastern Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Calhoun County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... Ouachita County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Drew County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 845 AM CDT. * At 755 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Sparkman, or 16 miles north of Camden, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Camden... Monticello... Warren... Fordyce... Hampton... Bearden... Stephens... Hermitage... Wilmar... Calion... Sparkman... Thornton... Chidester... Harrell... Louann... Bluff City... Ingalls... White Oak Lake State Park... Hampton Municipal Airport... Moro Bay... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bradley; Calhoun; Clark; Cleveland; Dallas; Drew; Ouachita
